context.introduction: Learn fundamental Korean cooking techniques that create the perfect balance of flavors and textures.

sections.title: Cooking Methods
sections.content: Korean cuisine uses specific cooking techniques that bring out the best in each ingredient.

sections.title: Knife Skills
sections.content: How you cut vegetables affects both cooking time and final presentation in Korean dishes.

sections.title: Flavor Balance
sections.content: Korean cooking seeks harmony between different taste elements to create satisfying meals.

sections.title: Essential Oils
listItems: Different oils bring different flavors to dishes
Balance creates the signature Korean taste profile
